text: læa meux xongkar thanghlay xan chad cæng khxng rea di thuk na ma xan kæ phwk khea cea ca sangket hen xakar bxkpad mi yxmrab bn bıhna khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa phwk khea keuxb ca kheapi tharay brrda phu xan xongkar thanghlay khxng rea hı phwk khea fang cng klaw theid muhammad “chan cacæng hı phwk than thrab thung sing thi lew ray ying kwa ni him man khux fi nrk ngi lea xallxh thrng sayya man wi kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa man pen thang klab thi chaw ray ying”
